Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that Barack Obama was re-elected by the largest gender gap in the history of American elections.
Understate: The claim may understate the significance of the gender gap by not providing enough context or comparison to previous elections.
Falters at times: The claim may falter at times by not providing a comprehensive analysis of all available data on the gender gap in presidential elections.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations or factors that may have contributed to the gender gap in Obama's re-election.
